entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 8:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -26.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
